Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate two students using a device to communicate over a distance.
The student can show that the device includes a string or wire connecting two ends for sound communication.
The student can depict that the device uses sound to send messages between the students.
The student can demonstrate how the device works by showing light or sound waves traveling from one student to the other.
The student can illustrate the benefits of using such a device for communicating over a distance.
